story:
Once upon a time, in the beautiful country of Ethiopia, there lived a young boy named Lelise. Lelise was a kind-hearted and curious boy who loved to explore the vast landscapes of his homeland.

One evening, as the sun began to set over the lush green hills, Lelise's grandmother called him to sit by the fire. She smiled kindly at him and began to tell a magical bedtime story.

"Long ago, in the heart of the Ethiopian highlands, there lived a wise old lion named Simba. Simba was known far and wide for his bravery and intelligence. But as he grew older, he realized that he needed to find a successor to protect his kingdom and all the creatures who lived there.

One day, Simba summoned all the young animals of the kingdom to a great gathering. He set them a series of challenges to test their courage, strength, and wisdom. Many animals tried, but none could pass all the tests until a humble little mouse named Tewodros appeared.

Tewodros was small and unassuming, but he had a heart as big as the sky and a determination that could move mountains. Despite his size, he fearlessly faced every challenge that Simba set before him. And in the end, he emerged victorious, earning the respect and admiration of all who witnessed his bravery.

Simba knew then that Tewodros was the one destined to be the next ruler of the kingdom. And so, with great ceremony and pride, he crowned the little mouse as his successor. From that day on, Tewodros ruled wisely and justly, ensuring peace and harmony in the land for generations to come."

As Lelise's grandmother finished the story, she tucked him into bed and kissed him goodnight. "Remember, my dear," she whispered, "no matter how small you may feel, you have the potential to achieve great things with courage and determination."

With those words of wisdom in his heart, Lelise drifted off to sleep, dreaming of a world where kindness and bravery could conquer all obstacles. And in his dreams, he could hear the roar of Simba and the gentle footsteps of Tewodros guiding him towards a future filled with endless possibilities.

Goodnight, sweet Lelise. May your dreams be as colorful and vibrant as the land of Ethiopia itself.
